Content.Text:
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Welcome.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's something I want to ask you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will you come with me to my room?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want to ask you about ruins. I'm
something of an enthusiast and have
been visiting ruins for many years.
<PAGE>
I heard you took a trip to some ruins
recently and wanted to ask you about
them.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much. Allow me to get
started.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see, I see. Thank you for sharing all
of this with me, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Just hearing about these ruins is making
me very excited to see them! I would
love to go myself.
Give a gift
Let me know when you're going
It's really great
Take care on the plane

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I can't accept that! It is a memento of
your travels. Are you sure you want me
to have it?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Then I accept it gratefully. I shall
treasure it always.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
From the way you were talking about
them, am I to understand that you like
ruins too, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I can recommend a few places that I've
visited many times myself, in that case.
They are quite wonderful.
<PAGE>
I wonder how you will feel about the
scenery that I consider to be beautiful?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
If possible... I would like to go with
you, one day. Not just to ruins, but to
lots of different places.
<PAGE>
I want to make lots of places that are
special to the two of us together. I've
been thinking that a lot recently.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Sorry, that almost sounds like a
proposal, didn't it!
<PAGE>
I'm sure any place will be special with
you at my side, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Allow me to take you home, anyway.
Please take my hand, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I will. I'll make sure to
bring something back for you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>? Is something the matter?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you perhaps mean... that you want to
go with me?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Sorry for not realizing straight away.
I'm very happy you said that.
<PAGE>
I'm sure I'll have a wonderful trip if
I take you with me, my love.
<PAGE>
Let's go together some time. Promise me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Allow me to take you home, anyway.
Please take my hand, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
It sounds it. Hearing you talk today has
just made me want to go even more.
<PAGE>
When Master Amir goes in that direction
next I will take the opportunity to
visit the ruins myself.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Allow me to take you home, anyway.
Let's go, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Does that mean you're concerned about
the quality of Charles' flying?
<PAGE>
That gives me second thoughts,
actually. I'll think it over again.
